data.description:
Sibiriens och Örebros finaste äntrar scenen den 14 maj. Tidig spelning så att alla hinner hem och få sin skönhetssömn. Valfri entré så att ingen kan skylla på att de inte har råd. God öl till lågt pris. Attenda här och du prickas av i dörren. 

Gör er själv en tjänst och DYK UPP!

Neverending Winter
All the way from Tomsk, Siberia!
Heavy, melancholic and dark with the best from the punk, metal and folk scenes.
https://www.facebook.com/pg/neverendingwinter/about/?ref=page_internal

sekt
Gubbsorgset livskrismangel från Örebro
https://www.facebook.com/Sektband/

Light Screamer
Noisig postpunk från Örebro
https://www.facebook.com/lightscreamer/ 

Åldergräns 18 år

I samarbete med Sensus
data.name: Neverending Winter - sekt - Light Screamer

data.description:
Light Screamers andra album, Switch, släpptes redan 2018 och har bland annat utsetts till en av 2018's bästa skivor av Slavestate. Nu är vinylen här och det firar vi med en storslagen releasefest där ni kan se den första spelningen med Light Screamer i Örebro på över två år!

Räkna med bra musik, trevligt folk och jävligt billig öl. Det finns egentligen inga ursäkter att inte gå på detta.

När?
26 januari 2019. Insläpp från 20.00. Light Screamer spelar 22.00.

Var?
Regression MC, Hjälmarevägen 69, Örebro.
Ta lokalbuss 9 till Valsaregatan. Gå 2 minuter.
Ta länsbuss 721 till Ormestagatan. Gå 2 minuter.
Ta cykel, tar ca 10 minuter från stan!

Hur?
Entré är 150 kr inklusive vinylen! Om någon inte vill ha vinylen är entrén 100 kr. 
Swisha pengar till 073-641 13 15 (Ida) och uppge namn och födelsedatum så skriver vi upp er på listan. (Vi behöver era personuppgifter då detta är ett evenemang i slutet sällskap, när ni swishar godkänner ni att vi sparar era uppgifter tills evenemanget är över.)

Om ni betalar i dörren är entrén 170 inkl. vinyl eller 120 utan vinyl.
data.name: Light Screamer "Switch" releasefest

data.description: Onsdagen den 31:a augusti klockan 20:00 spelar Light Screamer sin sista spelning, med denna uppsättning av bandet, på Nivå i Örebro. Starta festivalen på max, kom till Nivå! <3
data.name: Light Screamer på Live at Heart 2016

data.description:
Tja!
På torsdag ska Light Screamer och Innospecific Order spela tillsammans igen. Detta är så klart ett historiskt ögonblick med tanke på att senast detta skedde var 2 november 2013. Sedan dess har banden inte talat med varandra (vi talar tyst om vad som egentligen hände den där ödesdigra kvällen för nästan två är sedan) men vi hoppas att bandet Ett tyst jävla K kan steppa in och medla om det behövs.

Dyk nu upp på Tegelbruket den 8 oktober kl 18 och bevittna denna historiska händelse. Ni har inga ursäkter! Det är tidigt på en vanlig torsdag så ni ska ändå inte gå på krogen och dricka öl. Det är gratis och det är ingen åldersgräns så smala plånböcker och små barn är inga hinder. Passa på att bjussa med lite polare också!

Kram på er!
data.name: Light Screamer + Innospecific Order

data.description:
LIVE AT HEART 2014
3-6 september i Örebro

Light Screamer spelar på Scandic Garage, fredagen den 5 september, kl. 21:00. Vi ses där!

Tidigare samma kväll, kl. 17:00, är det vernissage på fotoutställningen "URGE" på Scandic Grand Hotel. Utställningen består av fotografier tagna av Jens Hellman, från Light Screamer, under bandets resor till Austin, TX 2013 och 2014. "URGE" pågår från den 28 augusti till och med den 21 september. Läs mer här: https://www.facebook.com/events/693914730683315/

Light Screamer släpper dessutom en ny 7" vinyl samt digital E.P! Läs mer om detta samt lyssna på hela "BFJ E.P." här:

www.lightscreamer.net

-----

Live at Heart 2014
September 3-6 in Örebro, Sweden

Light Screamer will be playing at Scandic Garage on Friday, September 5 at 9 pm. See you there!

Earlier the same night, at 5 pm, there's a vernissage for the photography exhibition "URGE" at Scandic Grand Hotel. The exhibition consists of photographs taken by Jens Hellman, from Light Screamer, during the band's trips to Austin, TX in 2013 and 2014. "URGE" will be on view from August 28 to September 21. Read more about it here: https://www.facebook.com/events/693914730683315/

Light Screamer is also releasing a new 7" vinyl and a digital E.P! Read more and listen to the whole "BFJ E.P." here:

www.lightscreamer.net
data.name: Light Screamer @ Live at Heart 2014

data.description:
Light Screamer presents ”BFJ”, ”BFJ E.P.” and the annual Live at Heart countdown

We're releasing a new E.P. and LIVE AT HEART is our release party. Join us in counting down the days to this years Live at Heart festival and hear new music in the process!

PLEASE NOTE: This event is only for the countdown itself (which is explained in detail below) and a place to gather all info on the release of our new E.P. By joining you are not agreeing to be at any particular place at any particular time, you're only supporting us and getting all the latest info on our release in your feed. For our show at this years Live at Heart, go here: https://www.facebook.com/events/833765533322948/

On September 3-6, Live at Heart takes place in Örebro for the 5th year in a row and Light Screamer will be playing again, for the 4th time, in a row (http://www.liveatheart.se/music/artists/SingleArtist?artist=3482). We only missed the first year due to not being formed yet. As the years previous, we will continue the tradition (which it's starting to become) of the Live at Heart countdown.

Starting August 8, Light Screamer will be releasing a new song every Friday until the Friday before Live at Heart. The songs will together make up the "BFJ E.P." that will be released digitally, worldwide, on August 29. There will also be a vinyl 7" version released, more info on that below.

Here is the release schedule for this countdown:

August 8: ”BFJ” - released through lightscreamer.net and SoundCloud
 (https://soundcloud.com/lightscreamer/bfj)

August 15: ”Sugary” - released through lightscreamer.net and SoundCloud
 (https://soundcloud.com/lightscreamer/sugary)

August 22: ”BFJ (Begging Function Jaded Remix)” - released through lightscreamer.net and SoundCloud
 (https://soundcloud.com/lightscreamer/bfj-begging-function-jaded)

August 29: ”BFJ E.P.” - worldwide digital release, available through Spotify, iTunes, Amazon, etc.
 (http://open.spotify.com/album/6bvPO5NfM0CVLMO2mL0KOD)

More info on the "BFJ" release:

On August 29, Light Screamer will release the digital EP ”BFJ E.P.”, followed, shortly after, by the vinyl 7” ”BFJ”. Both formats, released by Nominata Records, feature two songs recorded in March 2013 at The BBQ Shack in Austin, Texas. The first song, simply called ”BFJ”, is a Light Screamer original that was debuted at Live at Heart 2012 and has been a steady part of the live set since. The second song, called ”Sugary”, is a Cherubs cover that was recorded for a Cherubs tribute album called ”Everyone's Dead Before They Leave” that was released last year by Unfortunate Miracle Records. More info on the tribute album here: Cherubs (TX) (fan page) The song has since gotten a new intro and has been completely remastered. The digital release ”BFJ E.P.” also features two remixes, one of each song, making it a total of four new tracks.

The songs were recorded and mixed by Jason Morales (Tia Carrera, White Powder, Migas atx, Gorch Fock, Starfish, Butthole Surfers) in his analog studio The BBQ Shack, Analog Recording Studio in Austin, TX. The recordings were completed in one day and was pretty much recorded live in studio. A very limited amount of overdubs were done that same day, which mainly consisted of vocals. Photos from the recording session can be viewed at lightscreamer.net

”BFJ”, hand-numbered 7” with all unique covers (sorry, record collectors!), limited to 300 copies
(Out Fall 2014)

Side A: BFJ
Side B: Sugary

”BFJ E.P.”, digital release
(Out August 29)

1. BFJ
2. Sugary
3. BFJ (Begging Function Jaded Remix)
4. Sugary (Pink Bubblegum Autotune Remix)

data.name: Light Screamer Live 2013

data.description:
Light Screamer is once again playing at Live at Heart. This marks the third year in a row at the festival and we're as excited as ever. Come by and have a great time, and bring your friends, you won't be disappointed!

Please note that the date, time and venue are preliminary and may be subject to change.

PLEASE READ THIS: Live at Heart is hosting a competition in which the artist/band with the most successful Facebook event (i.e. this event) wins a price. So please join, share, like, comment and do as much as you possibly can to help us (even if you cannot attend)! We would be forever grateful! With the debut album "Gauss" coming out later this year and lots of other things coming up we need all the help we can get with promoting the band. Your contribution matters!
 
You should also check out Light Screamer's annual Live at Heart countdown (https://www.facebook.com/events/226143274199564/) where a new video is released each Friday up until Live at Heart begins.
 
We're really looking forward to this, hope you are too! You should! :)

www.lightscreamer.net
www.liveatheart.se
data.name: Light Screamer @ Live at Heart 2013

data.description:
Beginning August 9, Light Screamer will be releasing one video per week on YouTube up until the week before Live at Heart. This is a continuation of the concept that Light Screamer debuted in anticipation of last years Live at Heart-festival, but this year using videos instead of song outtakes.

Presenting the annual Live at Heart countdown by Light Screamer:

This years Live at Heart countdown will commence with the release of a trailer for the upcoming debut album “Gauss”. Given the subject matter and the fact that the trailer is clocking in at 3:29 it could almost be considered a short film. Following the release of the trailer, a video trilogy consisting of three songs from “Gauss” will be released. The countdown will end with a bonus video. This bonus video brings together the three individual music videos into one enhanced viewing experience. It's a video trilogy, it's the vision completed, it's "Gauss TV"! Here is the release schedule:

August 9: “Gauss” (Trailer)
     [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2bjOTo-9SqE&feature=share&list=PLgWsxKTeqQ74OhniiDVEC0NRJ9nwoG4eF]

August 16: “Take You Out” (Music Video)
     [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-h7zRVX0vdg&feature=share&list=PLgWsxKTeqQ74OhniiDVEC0NRJ9nwoG4eF]

August 23: “Bezymenskij’s Secret” (Music Video)
     [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ElgEBxgSLII&feature=share&list=PLgWsxKTeqQ74OhniiDVEC0NRJ9nwoG4eF]

August 30: “Eraser” (Music Video)
     [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PFGI4JddcJ8&feature=share&list=PLgWsxKTeqQ74OhniiDVEC0NRJ9nwoG4eF]

September 4: "Gauss TV" (Video Trilogy)
     [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IgZYSH2mQIs&feature=share&list=PLgWsxKTeqQ74OhniiDVEC0NRJ9nwoG4eF]

Live at Heart takes place in Örebro, Sweden between the 4th and 7th of September. Light Screamer will of course be playing. More information regarding that here: https://www.facebook.com/events/294308754040439/

www.lightscreamer.net
www.liveatheart.se
data.name: Light Screamer's annual Live at Heart countdown

data.description:
Date: Friday, September 7
Place: Harrys 3rd floor
Time: 21:00

Light Screamer is playing this years Live at Heart-festival and you don't want to miss it. Come join us for a great time and tell everyone else to do the same.

If you haven't done so already, check out the Light Screamer debut release countdown (http://www.facebook.com/events/143418435796620/) and listen to a new song each Friday, all the way up to Live at Heart.

We're excited to be playing, hope you're excited too! You should be!

data.description:
Starting on the 10th of August, Light Screamer will be releasing one new song per week for four weeks in a row, ending with the last song on the 31st of August. These will, together with the two songs already released, make up the six song debut release.

The songs will be made available on Light Screamers Facebook-page (www.facebook.com/lightscreamer) and on SoundCloud (www.soundcloud.com/lightscreamer).

Please join the countdown! Light Screamer will be performing live at this years Live at Heart-festival (www.facebook.com/liveatheart) the week after the release of the last song. See event here: http://www.facebook.com/events/528424073839631/

Don't miss out on any Light Screamer news, like the page on Facebook (www.facebook.com/lightscreamer).

All songs are now available:

F.Y.I.
Take You Out
Black Light
Cutbox
Bezymenskij's Secret
Eraser
